verses.verse: In the first <S%H259><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Darius <S%H1867><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahasuerus, <S%H325><s%> of the seed <S%H2233><s%> of the Medes, <S%H4074><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was made king <S%H4427><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the realm <S%H4438><s%> of the Chaldeans; <S%H3778><s%>

In the first <S%H259><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of his reign <S%H4427><s%> I Daniel <S%H1840><s%> understood <S%H995><s%> by books <S%H5612><s%> the number <S%H4557><s%> of the years, <S%H8141><s%> whereof <S%H834><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> that he would accomplish <S%H4390><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in the desolations <S%H2723><s%> of Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

And I set <S%H5414><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> to the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> to seek <S%H1245><s%> by prayer <S%H8605><s%> and supplications, <S%H8469><s%> with fasting, <S%H6685><s%> and sackcloth, <S%H8242><s%> and ashes: <S%H665><s%>

And I prayed <S%H6419><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> and made my confession, <S%H3034><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> O Lord, <S%H136><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> and dreadful <S%H3372><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> keeping <S%H8104><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> and mercy <S%H2617><s%> to them that love <S%H157><s%> him, and to them that keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments; <S%H4687><s%>

We have sinned, <S%H2398><s%> and have committed <S%H5753><s%> iniquity, <S%H5753><s%> and have done wickedly, <S%H7561><s%> and have rebelled, <S%H4775><s%> even by departing <S%H5493><s%> from your precepts <S%H4687><s%> and from your judgments: <S%H4941><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> have we listened <S%H8085><s%> to your servants <S%H5650><s%> the prophets, <S%H5030><s%> which <S%H834><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> in your name <S%H8034><s%> to our kings, <S%H4428><s%> our princes, <S%H8269><s%> and our fathers, <S%H1><s%> and to all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>

O LORD, <S%H136><s%> righteousness <S%H6666><s%> belongs to you, but to us confusion <S%H1322><s%> of faces, <S%H6440><s%> as at this <S%H2088><s%> day; <S%H3117><s%> to the men <S%H376><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and to the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and to all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that are near, <S%H7138><s%> and that are far <S%H7350><s%> off, through all <S%H3605><s%> the countries <S%H776><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> you have driven <S%H5080><s%> them, because of their trespass <S%H4604><s%> that they have trespassed <S%H4603><s%> against you.

O Lord, <S%H136><s%> to us belongs confusion <S%H1322><s%> of face, <S%H6440><s%> to our kings, <S%H4428><s%> to our princes, <S%H8269><s%> and to our fathers, <S%H1><s%> because <S%H834><s%> we have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against you.
To the Lord <S%H136><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> belong mercies <S%H7356><s%> and forgivenesses, <S%H5547><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> we have rebelled <S%H4775><s%> against him;

Neither <S%H3808><s%> have we obeyed <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> to walk <S%H3212><s%> in his laws, <S%H8451><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> us by his servants <S%H5650><s%> the prophets. <S%H5030><s%>

Yes, all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> have transgressed <S%H5674><s%> your law, <S%H8451><s%> even by departing, <S%H5493><s%> that they might not obey <S%H8085><s%> your voice; <S%H6963><s%> therefore the curse <S%H423><s%> is poured <S%H5413><s%> on us, and the oath <S%H7621><s%> that is written <S%H3789><s%> in the law <S%H8451><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> we have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against him.

And he has confirmed <S%H6965><s%> his words, <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he spoke <S%H1696><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> us, and against <S%H5921><s%> our judges <S%H8199><s%> that judged <S%H8199><s%> us, by bringing <S%H935><s%> on us a great <S%H1419><s%> evil: <S%H7451><s%> for under <S%H8478><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> has not been done <S%H6213><s%> as has been done <S%H6213><s%> on Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

As it is written <S%H3789><s%> in the law <S%H8451><s%> of Moses, <S%H4872><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> on us: yet made we not our prayer <S%H2470><s%> before <S%H854><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> that we might turn <S%H7725><s%> from our iniquities, <S%H5771><s%> and understand <S%H7919><s%> your truth. <S%H571><s%>

Therefore has the LORD <S%H3068><s%> watched <S%H8245><s%> on the evil, <S%H7451><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> it on us: for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> is righteous <S%H6662><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> his works <S%H4639><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he does: <S%H6213><s%> for we obeyed <S%H8085><s%> not his voice. <S%H6963><s%>

And now, <S%H6258><s%> O Lord <S%H136><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> that have brought <S%H3318><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and have gotten <S%H6213><s%> you renown, <S%H8034><s%> as at this day; <S%H3117><s%> we have sinned, <S%H2398><s%> we have done wickedly. <S%H7561><s%>

O LORD, <S%H136><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> your righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> I beseech <S%H4994><s%> you, let your anger <S%H639><s%> and your fury <S%H2534><s%> be turned <S%H7725><s%> away from your city <S%H5892><s%> Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> your holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain: <S%H2022><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> for our sins, <S%H2399><s%> and for the iniquities <S%H5771><s%> of our fathers, <S%H1><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and your people <S%H5971><s%> are become a reproach <S%H2781><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> that are about <S%H5439><s%> us.

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, O our God, <S%H430><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of your servant, <S%H5650><s%> and his supplications, <S%H8469><s%> and cause your face <S%H6440><s%> to shine <S%H215><s%> on your sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> that is desolate, <S%H8074><s%> for the Lord's <S%H136><s%> sake. <S%H4616><s%>

O my God, <S%H430><s%> incline <S%H5186><s%> your ear, <S%H241><s%> and hear; <S%H8085><s%> open <S%H6491><s%> your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and behold <S%H7200><s%> our desolations, <S%H8074><s%> and the city <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is called <S%H7121><s%> by your name: <S%H8034><s%> for we do not present <S%H5307><s%> our supplications <S%H8469><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you for our righteousnesses, <S%H6666><s%> but for your great <S%H7227><s%> mercies. <S%H7356><s%>

O Lord, <S%H136><s%> hear; <S%H8085><s%> O Lord, <S%H136><s%> forgive; <S%H5545><s%> O Lord, <S%H136><s%> listen <S%H7181><s%> and do; <S%H6213><s%> defer <S%H309><s%> not, for your own sake, <S%H4616><s%> O my God: <S%H430><s%> for your city <S%H5892><s%> and your people <S%H5971><s%> are called <S%H7121><s%> by your name. <S%H8034><s%>

And whiles <S%H5750><s%> I was speaking, <S%H1696><s%> and praying, <S%H6419><s%> and confessing <S%H3034><s%> my sin <S%H2403><s%> and the sin <S%H2403><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and presenting <S%H5307><s%> my supplication <S%H8467><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%> for the holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> of my God; <S%H430><s%>

Yes, whiles <S%H5750><s%> I was speaking <S%H1696><s%> in prayer, <S%H8605><s%> even the man <S%H376><s%> Gabriel, <S%H1403><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> I had seen <S%H7200><s%> in the vision <S%H2377><s%> at the beginning, <S%H8462><s%> being caused to fly <S%H3286><s%> swiftly, <S%H3288><s%> touched <S%H5060><s%> me about the time <S%H6256><s%> of the evening <S%H6153><s%> oblation. <S%H4503><s%>

And he informed <S%H995><s%> me, and talked <S%H1696><s%> with me, and said, <S%H559><s%> O Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> I am now <S%H6258><s%> come <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> to give you skill <S%H7919><s%> and understanding. <S%H998><s%>

At the beginning <S%H8462><s%> of your supplications <S%H8469><s%> the commandment <S%H1697><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> forth, <S%H3318><s%> and I am come <S%H935><s%> to show <S%H5046><s%> you; for you are greatly beloved: <S%H2530><s%> therefore understand <S%H995><s%> the matter, <S%H1697><s%> and consider <S%H995><s%> the vision. <S%H2377><s%>

Seventy <S%H7657><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%> are determined <S%H2852><s%> on your people <S%H5971><s%> and on your holy <S%H6944><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> to finish <S%H3607><s%> the transgression, <S%H6588><s%> and to make an end <S%H2856><s%> of sins, <S%H2403><s%> and to make reconciliation <S%H3722><s%> for iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> and to bring <S%H935><s%> in everlasting <S%H5769><s%> righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> and to seal <S%H2856><s%> up the vision <S%H2377><s%> and prophecy, <S%H5030><s%> and to anoint <S%H4886><s%> the most <S%H6944><s%> Holy. <S%H6944><s%>

Know <S%H3045><s%> therefore and understand, <S%H7919><s%> that from the going <S%H4161><s%> forth <S%H4161><s%> of the commandment <S%H1697><s%> to restore <S%H7725><s%> and to build <S%H1129><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to the Messiah <S%H4899><s%> the Prince <S%H5057><s%> shall be seven <S%H7651><s%> weeks, <S%H7620><s%> and three score <S%H8346><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> weeks: <S%H7620><s%> the street <S%H7339><s%> shall be built <S%H1129><s%> again, <S%H7725><s%> and the wall, <S%H2742><s%> even in troublous <S%H5916><s%> times. <S%H6256><s%>

And after <S%H310><s%> three score <S%H8346><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%> shall Messiah <S%H4899><s%> be cut <S%H3772><s%> off, but not for himself: and the people <S%H5971><s%> of the prince <S%H5057><s%> that shall come <S%H935><s%> shall destroy <S%H7843><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> and the sanctuary; <S%H6944><s%> and the end <S%H7093><s%> thereof shall be with a flood, <S%H7858><s%> and to the end <S%H7093><s%> of the war <S%H4421><s%> desolations <S%H8074><s%> are determined. <S%H2782><s%>

And he shall confirm <S%H1396><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> with many <S%H7227><s%> for one <S%H259><s%> week: <S%H7620><s%> and in the middle <S%H2677><s%> of the week <S%H7620><s%> he shall cause the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> and the oblation <S%H4503><s%> to cease, <S%H7673><s%> and for the overspreading <S%H3671><s%> of abominations <S%H8251><s%> he shall make it desolate, <S%H8074><s%> even until <S%H5704><s%> the consummation, <S%H3617><s%> and that determined <S%H2782><s%> shall be poured <S%H5413><s%> on the desolate. <S%H8076><s%>
